code: import React,{useState,useContext}from'react';import'./StyleItem.css';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{useCartContext}from'../../Context/CartContext';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Item=function Item(_ref){var product=_ref.product;var _useCartContext=useCartContext(),products=_useCartContext.products;var isInCart=products.some(function(prod){return prod.id===product.id;});var name=product.name,price=product.price,img=product.img,description=product.description,category=product.category;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"StyleCard",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"thumbnail",src:img,alt:name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"StyleCard-body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"StyleCard-tittle",children:name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"StyleCard-cat",children:category}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"StyleCard-text",children:description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["$",price]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/detail/".concat(product.id),className:"StyleCard-btn",children:"Ver detalle"})]})]}),isInCart&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Ya esta en el Carrito"})]});};export default Item;
